description: As coronavirus infections rise, many people who keep track of this say there is a curve that needs flattening. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Steps countries are taking to buy time to help fight the virus
title_page: Steps countries are taking to buy time to help fight the virus | The Straits Times
maintext:
As coronavirus infections rise, many people who keep track of this say there is a curve that needs flattening.
The epidemic curve is used to visualise the extent and speed of new cases during a virus outbreak.
